text: Woke up okay but by afternoon I felt this dull headache behind my eyes. Had masala chai with 2 tsp sugar. Lunch was rice + dal + achar. Emotionally a bit edgy, snapping at people for no reason. By evening, mind felt scattered—kept forgetting what I opened the laptop for.
Kal raat neend theek nahi thi. 3am ko uthi, phir 30 min tak aankh hi nahi lagi. Subah coffee pi and skipped breakfast. Feeling anxious in chest, like tightness. No cramps today though.
Dinner: paneer bhurji + 2 rotis. After eating, I got super sleepy and my stomach felt bloated. Mood was actually good—felt calm and grateful. Brain felt clear, focused while reading.

Had oats with banana and walnuts. Noticed mild joint soreness in my knees when I went downstairs. Mentally I was ruminating about work; couldn't stop replaying a conversation. Felt low-energy but not sad.
Went for a short walk. Later ate biryani (small bowl) + raita. Felt heartburn after that, and a slight nausea. Emotion: irritated + impatient. Mind: racing thoughts at night.
आज body heavy लग रही है. Skipped gym. Had only toast and butter. No headache now. Feeling meh, kind of flat. Concentration was poor—kept rereading the same email.

Big meeting day. I was nervous before it but once it started I felt confident. Ate salad with chickpeas and feta for lunch. By late afternoon, my neck was stiff and there was sharp pain when I turned left.
Slept 8 hours, finally. Still woke up with puffy face and mild sinus pressure. Breakfast was idli + sambar. Emotionally steady. Mind felt slow for the first hour, then improved.

Late-night snacking: chocolate + chips while watching TV. Felt guilty after. Also had stomach cramps, but I'm not sure if it's PMS or just junk food. Thoughts were looping—kept thinking 'I messed up today'.
Lunch was quinoa bowl with roasted veggies and hummus. Felt energized after eating. No bloating. Emotion was upbeat, almost playful. Mind felt present—less doomscrolling, more actual work done.
